name: Wyrm Simulator
description:
Use up and down keys to slither in the sky! Not much to be done at the moment, besides flying, collecting stars, and getting longer!

This game is made using the Godot game engine. Game source code is available at: https://github.com/elektito/wyrmsim

3rd party credits:

Collectible: particleWhite_6.png from Kenney's Puzzle Pack 2 (CC0)

Collection sounds: Magic Stars Retro Sparkle, split up (CC0) 

Music: Gymnopedie by Sascha Ende®
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/222-gymnopedie
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

This game uses the Godot game engine which is under the MIT license: https://godotengine.org/license
